channel.title: The Chronomancer and The Timesnatcher [Classes]
channel.description:
> # [color=steblue]Chronomancer[/color] > **Blue Dragon Support** > > **Time Warp (Night)** - All attacks on your target will instead hit 2 days later. This does not affect bleeding/poisoning. (Infinite uses) > > **Pocket Dimension (Night)** - Move to a pocket dimension for the night. All abilities that should target you tonight will instead target you in 2 nights. (1 use) > > *You win when all threats to the Blue Dragon have been eliminated.*
> # [color=purple]Timesnatcher[/color] > > **Unseen Support** > > **Groundhog Night (Night)** - Everything that happens to your target tonight will also happen to them tommorow night, independent of any abilities. (2 uses) > > **Dark Dimension (Night)** - Move to a dark dimension tonight. All investigatives targeting the Unseen tonight will instead receive the investigative results appropriate to your target. (2 uses) > > *You win when the Blue Dragon and all others who stand in your way have been eliminated.*
I'm just going to ask for thoughts on this. I hope it looks good!

item.title: The Chronomancer and The Timesnatcher [Classes]
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Icibalus:

Groundhog Night (Night) - Everything that happens to your target tonight will also happen to them tommorow night, independent of any abilities. (2 uses)

Dark Dimsneison (Night) - Move to a dark dimension tongiht. All investigatives targeting the Unseen tonight will instead target your target. (2 uses)

It needs to be able to have a unlimited use ability. I don’t like converts who don’t

item.title: The Chronomancer and The Timesnatcher [Classes]
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
I liked this concept when it had tornado, since you could redirect an attack to someone else. This version seems more like a nerfed physician in my opinion. Maybe make it so it delays all negative effects and not only attacks?

Read full topic

item.title: The Chronomancer and The Timesnatcher [Classes]
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
Chronomancer

Blue Dragon Support

Time Warp (Night) - All attacks on your target will instead hit 2 days later. This does not affect bleeding/poisoning. (Infinite uses)

Pocket Dimension (Night) - Move to a pocket dimension for the night. All abilities that should target you tonight will instead target you in 2 nights. (1 use)

You win when all threats to the Blue Dragon have been eliminated.

Timesnatcher

Unseen Support

Groundhog Night (Night) - Everything that happens to your target tonight will also happen to them tommorow night, independent of any abilities. (2 uses)

Dark Dimension (Night) - Move to a dark dimension tonight. All investigatives targeting the Unseen tonight will instead receive the investigative results appropriate to your target. (2 uses)

You win when the Blue Dragon and all others who stand in your way have been eliminated.

I’m just going to ask for thoughts on this. I hope it looks good!

Read full topic
